title: Apostle
review: It's {The Wicker Man} but with more thrills and horror tropes injected, and without the slow burn and focus that makes the older film so good. There are fight and chase scenes that didn't really need to be there, and they squandered the immersive world it initially set up. There's a guy who gets kerplunked by five spears at once. It is a bit of a generic modern horror movie wrapped in a classic folk horror aesthetic.
